The 43-year-old six-time Super Bowl champ's wife Gisele Bündchen shared a snap of her… [+3318 chars]

articles.title: America's Cup: Sir Ben Ainslie on Team UK's 'yellow card' threat | Stuff.co.nz - Stuff
articles.description: Sir Ben Ainslie speaks about the complaint of non-compliance that puts INEOS Team UK at risk of disqualification from an upcoming race: https://bit.ly/2YnRnU...
